sentences.en: ...instructional material designed to help you with your lifestyle.
sentences.cn: ...旨在为你的生活方式提供帮助的指导材料。

sentences.en: As an efficient instructional technology of reading , adjunction can facilitate reading comprehension.
sentences.cn: 附加问题是一种有效的阅读教学技术.

sentences.en: First, instructional technology must follow the principles of effective instruction.
sentences.cn: 首先, 指导的技术必须跟随原则有效说明.

sentences.en: Furthermore, it will make progress of nativization study on instructional design.
sentences.cn: 此外, 还将进一步推进教学设计本土化研究的进程.

sentences.en: He conducted these instructional sessions with animation and humor.
sentences.cn: 他在这些会议上讲话诙谐生动.

sentences.en: Multiple subband analysis is instructional to recognition application project.
sentences.cn: 试验表明,多子带分析技术对识别工程应用有指导意义.

sentences.en: Schools and colleges and universities co - sponsoring, with a variety of instructional models.
sentences.cn: 学校与高校联合办学, 具有多种教学模式.

sentences.en: The characters of adult education make its instructional administration complex.
sentences.cn: 成人教育的特点决定了成人教务管理系统的复杂性.

sentences.en: The disconnection between theory and practice of instructional design is universal.
sentences.cn: 教学设计理论和实践脱节问题已普遍存在.

sentences.en: The guiding principle of design is the research of instructional design model.
sentences.cn: 而设计的指导思想就是本文对教学设计模式的研究成果.

sentences.en: The instructional language is English and Mandarin.
sentences.cn: 教学语言是英语和华文.

sentences.en: These conclusions and discoveries have certain instructional significance to engineering design.
sentences.cn: 这些结论和发现对工程设计具有一定的指导意义.

sentences.en: Today, most cyclotrons are used either for instructional purpose or for isotope production.
sentences.cn: 今天大多数回旋加速器是用在教学上,或者用于同位素生产.

sentences.en: What instructional strategies and resources will the teacher use?
sentences.cn: 教师将使用哪些教学策略和资源?

sentences.en: While Instructional Design is the integration of theories with some concrete course.
sentences.cn: 教学设计是这些是理论与具体学科的整合.

sentences.en: You may wish to take advantage of our instructional session.
sentences.cn: 你应该充分利用我们的教学课程。
